title: LG 235 L Direct Cool Single Door 5 Star Refrigerator with Base Drawer  (Shiny Steel, GL-D241APZZ)

product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Refrigerator Unit and 10 Years on Compressor From LG
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship

product_description.Moist \u2018N' Fresh Cover: Moist ‘N' Fresh is a lattice-patterned box cover in this refrigerator that balances the moisture levels to keep the food items moist and fresh.
product_description.Runs on Home Inverter: Thanks to Smart Connect technology, this appliance lets you connect it to your home inverter so that it keeps running even during a power cut. So, your food items remain fresh and don’t get spoiled soon.

review:
Nice refrigerator on this price range
Nice Quality
Nice Design
Nice fast cooling feature
Also the packaging is very good 👌
But
The Deforest ice water is not directly
go on the out of refrigerator

All over the points
The refrigerator is the Excellent.

obviously lg is super brand. it is working well still now. it has no sound and cool fastly. better for small family. always believable brand. I wish to get 235ltr. instead of 215 ltrs. I was asked customer service but they agree to exchange same capacity. its OK. I choose a good one. thank you.
awesome prouct from lg. excellent direct cooling no notice works silent excellent colour and design

The fridge is so light that it each time I open, it moves slightly and after 3 days, I have to switch off and move it to prevent it from hitting the wall. They have given a base drawer which is meant for storing dry stuff like onion etc. But it is not a good idea. It is very easy for dust to get into it and very difficult to maintain cleanliness under the fridge.
Ice sets pretty fast as claimed. But this also makes.one to defrost more frequently and defrost takes a lot.of time. It took.11.pm to 8 am for defrost button to come.to normal position and melted water spilled down on the crisp tray and also on veggie basket. Such long time for defrost will.spoil certain foods which requires continuous coolness. After defrost, we need to manually remove the water.
Noise level is much lower than my previous fridge but at times it makes some weird sounds.. one sound is quite frequent though not very loud. Due to.lockdown, customer care is yet to attend to this issue.
I am.yet to receive power bill to check out energy savings. Hope that will be positive. Will update once I get the power bill.

It has been 1 week since delivered on time by Flipkart.
Very excellent Refrigerator by LG with a powerful & fastest cooling
Having pin-drop silence while working.
5 Star is a bonus and consumes little amount of electricity, exactly 104 units/Year.
But I strictly follow Step 3- ( Wait for 2 hours( i took 6 or more) before plugging in to get the best performance (oil will settle) & 4- Run for 12+ Hours while keeping the temperature knob at No.4 also without load inside the refrigerator. (Uniform temperature inside )

Moreover, my mom likes it and she wants to give it 5 Stars.
Thank you LG & Flipkart.
Make in India.

Received yesterday
1) Design is impressive
2) 5 star 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
3) received latest 2022 model
4) packaging was good
5) delivery was fast received within 2 days.

Good for small family of 3-4 members.

If you want good refrigerator with no.1 company go for it blindly.

answers: A:As on the sticker 109 per year but from my experience about 1.5-2unit per day so yearly 547.5-730unit yearly... I don't know why
A:Not cover but stand will be available
A:Earthing should be there for our safety.
A:In every one week should defrost one time for enhance cooling capacity of freeze.
A:No, it doesn't require any additional stabilizer.
A:It operates according to the temperature in the fridge: runs at full speed when it needs cooling down and stops completely when the temperature is low enough.
A:NO. IT IS NOT RUN ON SOLAR ENERGY
A:simply plug it in switch board
A:No . not much. little heating is always there with any refridgerator. so far good experience. nice fridge
A:no inbuilt stablizer, not required also
A:Its adverized value is 139 unit per year. But will be significantly more than that in real life usage
A:external stand provided for free by company
A:104 units /year as provided in manual
A:No power saving and very slow cooling not effective cooling.
A:Back side not covered in LG 215L
A:Yes. It's comes with base drawer.
